title: Projects
lead:
The regular CLARIAH-AT call for contributions within the consortium aims at supporting research activities that are in alignment with the Digital Humanities Austria Strategy 2021+ (Vier Leitlinien für Digital Humanities in Österreich, https://gams.uni-graz.at/o:clariah.dha-strategie-2021), as well as the strategic goals of the infrastructure consortia CLARIN-ERIC (https://www.clarin.eu/) and DARIAH-EU (https://www.dariah.eu/, see DARIAH Strategic Plan 2019-2026, https://www.dariah.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Strategic-Plan_2019-2026.pdf).

In addition, an important part of the CLARIAH-AT activities were the three go!digital calls (https://www.oeaw.ac.at/foerderungen/godigital) in 2014, 2016 and 2018, which were competitively advertised and organized by the Austrian Academy of Sciences with funding from the Austrian National Foundation for Research, Technology and Development. The 30 projects selected by international experts promote the development and use of innovative digital methods in Austrian humanities research.
